description:
Crystal Vale: Dino Escape is a fast-paced adventure platformer set in a beautiful but dangerous dinosaur world. Trapped in a mysterious crystal valley, you must outrun prehistoric predators, explore vibrant environments, and collect powerful crystals to survive.

Run, jump, swim, dash, and parachute your way through four unique maps filled with hazards, hidden paths, and relentless dinosaurs that will stop at nothing to catch you. Every crystal you collect brings you closer to escaping the valley, but danger lurks around every corner.

With fluid movement, colorful environments, and thrilling chase gameplay, Crystal Vale: Dino Escape delivers an exciting experience for players who love action, exploration, and fast reflexes.

Can you escape the valley before the dinosaurs catch you?
